item.description:
The Fatherhood Coalition annual statewide meeting will take place Saturday,
Jan 8, 1:00-4:00 p.m. at the Westborough Public Library, 55 West Main St., Westborough, MA

Nominations are being requested for the officer positions of co-chair,
treasurer, secretary and state-wide outreach. Consideration will also be
given to newly created positions of special interest such as court system
liaison, fundraiser, etc. Nominations will be accepted up to Dec. 31.
Individuals can nominate themselves. Please reply to
support@fatherhoodcoalition.org with a short statement of why you or the
person nominated would like the position.

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: Coalition Statewide Meeting, Jan. 8
